text: But he said discussions "on a higher level than in the past" might be useful. The President will probably discuss the problem with Dr. Brentano, the West German Foreign Minister, who is due in Washington next week. A big slice of Germany's aid is the early payment of a 210 million debt to America. United States officials quickly point out that this is money due to America anyway.
handwritten_text: But he said discussions "on a higher level than in the past" might be useful. The President will probably discuss the problem with Dr. Brentano, the West German Foreign Minister, who is due in Washington next week. A big slice of Germany's aid is the early payment of a 210 million debt to America. United States officials quickly point out that this is money due to America anyway.
